title: Part F
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:

title: Part G
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide the correct answer and/or a valid justification.

  • Zero. The observation that the reaction stops progressing implies that E cell =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F70@ , indicating that there is no longer a driving force for the reaction.

    OR

  • Zero.
